Title: Firewalker
Plot: Mulder and Scully, reunited at last, head for an active volcano under a geological study and find a deadly life form that can survive in the searing heat of the crater and is killing the scientists to avoid being discovered.
GuestStars: Bradley Whitford, Tuck Milligan, Leland Orser, Shawnee Smith, Hiro Kanagawa, Torren Rolfsen, David Kaye
